title: Taverna Romana Hamburg
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Offers vegetarian choices on the menu, of which some may be vegan or can be made vegan; please inquire.
Also are happy to cater to any special vegan requests. Restaurant founded in 1828 by Mr. Max Dibbern and the traditional decor is still intact from that era; lead glass windows, wooden facade, a light dome and paintings. Building is an integral part of the Sternschanze district and well worth a visit from an historical viewpoint also.
